personalize.translation[0].definitions[0: to put your name or initials on something, or to decorate it in your own way, to show that it belongs to you
Why not do something to personalize your office?
personalize.translation[0].definitions[1: to design or change something so that it is suitable for a particular person
All the products can be personalized to the client’s exact requirements.
personalize.translation[0].definitions[2: to discuss a subject by talking about or criticizing the people who are involved in it, rather than talking about it in a more general way
